item.title: Zellij Dev's Best Friend
item.description: What is Zellij ? # Another day another Terminal utility. Zellij is a terminal workspace. It has the base functionality of a terminal multiplexer (similar to tmux or screen) but includes many built-in features that would allow users to extend it and create their own personalized environment.
